info.title: Moon God
info.description: Thesssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss HRToPay APIs Creates Core HR data for HR to Moorepay Payroll Integration.

requestBody.description: Basic HR to Pay employee details to holdoing table field to insert

200.description: Inserts submitted new hr details from Natural HR system. if requestor, is authorized to do so

requestBody.description: Basic HR to Pay employee details to holdoing table field to update

200.description: Updates submitted new hr details from Natural HR system. if requestor, is authorized to do so
Request HR To Pay employee details from holding table for given that the requestor is authorized to view

parameters.name: hr_employee_id
parameters.description: Basic HR to Pay employee details to holdoing table field to delete

200.description: Deletes submitted new hr details from Natural HR system. if requestor, is authorized to do so

Delete timesheets from NHR details if requestor is authorized to do so
Inserts submitted employee leave information from NHR if requestor is authorized to do so

requestBody.description: Employee Leavers Details fields to be updated, If you want to clear out the values then pass the value as "NULL","Null" or "null"

requestBody.description: Employee expenses type fields to insert from NHR details

EmployeeExpensesNHR.description: Maps to tables CCEMPMAS, TSDATA, TCOMM, PEMPMEXT

EmployeeTimesheetsForNHR.description: Maps to table TSDATA, TSDATAE and PEMPMEXT

half_day_pm.description: Half Day PM / Half First Day

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 


                      Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.
                      

Example: 'Bearer 12345abcdef'
Bearer.name: Authorization
